Name: Hyper Flight
About the game: Hyper Flight is a sci-fi flight simulator and racing game that rewards good piloting. It utilises realistic physics to provide a satisfying and challenging flight experience. The game takes place on planetary bodies within our own solar system. Learn to fly like a pro by completing the training challenges and race in fast-paced interplanetary tournament events. Good luck and don't crash.
Meta Title: Hyper Flight: Apr 26, 2019, Lewis Fitzjohn and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hyper Flight? Check out the release date (Apr 26, 2019), developer insights from Lewis Fitzjohn, and a complete game summary.
